about.details:
Incorporated in April 2005, Avi Ansh Textile Limited is a manufacturer and exporter of 100% cotton yarn, including combed and carded cotton yarn in various counts.

Avi Ansh Textile Limited has achieved ISO 14001:2015 and ISO 9001:2015 certifications, showcasing its dedication to environmental management and quality assurance.

The company operates in both domestic and global markets, manufacturing and supplying a variety of yarns and fabrics to meet customer needs.

The company operates spinning factories with a total capacity of 26,000 spindles, producing approximately 4,500 metric tons of cotton yarn annually, ranging from 20s to 40s counts.

As of September 2024, the company has 281 employees in various departments.

Competitive Strengths:

  • The chosen site for the manufacturing plant offers a strategic advantage.
  • Diversified product offerings underscore its commitment to quality.
  • The company's experienced management team brings a wealth of expertise and leadership.

faqs.question: What is the Avi Ansh Textile IPO?
faqs.answer:
Avi Ansh Textile IPO is a SME IPO of 4192000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹25.99 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹62 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 20, 2024, and closes on September 24, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Avi Ansh Textile IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Avi Ansh Textile IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Avi Ansh Textile IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Avi Ansh Textile IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Avi Ansh Textile IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Avi Ansh Textile IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Avi Ansh Textile IPO opens on September 20, 2024 and closes on September 24, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Avi Ansh Textile IPO?
faqs.answer: Avi Ansh Textile IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Avi Ansh Textile IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Avi Ansh Textile IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Avi Ansh Textile IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Avi Ansh Textile IPO will be done on Wednesday, September 25, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, September 26, 2024. Check the Avi Ansh Textile IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Avi Ansh Textile IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Avi Ansh Textile IPO listing date is on Friday, September 27, 2024.
